verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: after treading water for a few months] [ARG1: the brewers] [V: became] [ARG2: champion swimmers down stretch] the brewers kept their heads above water in the middle of the season but got hot at the right time going 20 - 7 in september to make the playoffs treading water milwaukee brewers david stearns brewers chicago cubs
